paragraphs.6: Only a session cookie is used on the site and expires after 14 days.
paragraphs.7: The contents on this site may include contents from external sources (for instance videos, images, ...). These embedded contents act in the same way as if the visitor had visited the original site from where this content is based. These sites may therefore use additional cookies.

description.placeholder: Please provide comprehensive details and context regarding the issue you're experiencing. Include as much information as possible, such as the specific steps or actions leading up to the problem. Additionally, if feasible, provide a clear set of instructions on how to replicate the issue. This will greatly assist in understanding and addressing the issue effectively
